author: Staff Reporter
text:
Gram sabha meetings will be held in all the 95 village panchayats in Kanyakumari district on January 26, according to a release from Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan here on Sunday.

He said the meetings should be conducted on rotation basis in all the wards within the panchayat at 11 a.m.

The meetings should discussdevelopment works being undertaken and to be taken up for the next financial year and get the approval of the meetings.
title: Grama sabha meetings tomorrow
